com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.basic

Class BasicDataColumn<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.AbstractDataColumn<T>
      • com.pb.sawdust.tabledata.basic.BasicDataColumn<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of data held by this data column.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataColumn<T>, java.lang.Iterable<T>

    public class BasicDataColumn<T>
extends AbstractDataColumn<T>
    The BasicDataColumn class provides a simple implementation of the DataColumn interface. The primary key of the underlying table is frozen upon instantiation; that is, updates to the underlying table's primary key will not be reflected in the BasicDataColumn instance.

      • BasicDataColumn

        public BasicDataColumn(java.lang.String columnLabel,
               T[] columnValues,
               DataType type,
               TableKey<K> primaryKey)
        Constructor specifying the column label, values, type, and primary key.
        Parameters:
        columnLabel - The column's label.
        columnValues - The data values for the column.
        type - The data type for the column. This should appropriately match the component type of the columnValues array.
        primaryKey - The primary key to use for this column.

      • getCell

        public T getCell(int rowIndex)
        Description copied from interface: DataColumn
        Get the column value at a given index. Indices are 0-based, for reason described in DataTable.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The (0-based) number of the column value to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the column value at rowIndex.

      • getCellByKey

        public <K> T getCellByKey(K key)
        Description copied from interface: DataColumn
        Get the column value at a specified key location. This method is optional and requires some sort of access to the primary key of the source data set. Whether the primary key is dynamic (i.e. changing the key on the data table will cause this method to refer to the new key) is implemntation specific.
        Parameters:
        key - The key value of the row whose column value is to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the column value corresponding to key.
        See Also:
        TableKey.getKeyColumnType()
